root: ^Ugh. These last few days have been crazy.
^I don't know if anyone trusts me anymore. And they shouldn't.
^I have been complicit in the attack of an innocent house.
^These people have no reason to support me, yet I have their support. I don't understand.
^How can I be the person they expect me to be when I have failed at every turn?
^I have been led astray so many times.
^But no. I won't let anyone convince me to do something that I do not consent to do.
^No one dictates my life. No one but myself.
^We have one last shot to bring order to the world, and we have no shot if I cannot live up to those expectations that are set for me.
^There are people now who I care about. People who are relying on me. A world that is on the brink of disaster.
^Did House Ivy agree to the council?
^But they are not the only ones.
^Oh... and our ladies have made contact with House Holly.
^They have also agreed to join the council.
^House Cherry-Blossom has agreed to the council.
